subject: Sailboats and Sailing
Volvo Ocean Race
lead_paragraph: Team Vestas Wind has run aground on the Cargados Carajos Shoals, Mauritius, in the Indian Ocean during the Volvo Ocean race, and the crew plans to abandon ship at daylight.
snippet: Team Vestas Wind has run aground on the Cargados Carajos Shoals, Mauritius, in the Indian Ocean during the Volvo Ocean race, and the crew plans to abandon ship at daylight.
